Package com.programix.thread

Class StateMonitor<T extends StateMonitor.Monitorable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.programix.thread.StateMonitor<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.programix.thread.ThreadSafe
    public class StateMonitor<T extends StateMonitor.Monitorable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.programix.thread.ThreadSafe

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  StateMonitor.Listener<T>
      Implemented by code which wants to know when the state actually changes.
      static interface  StateMonitor.Monitorable<T>
      Implemented my states which support being monitored.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StateMonitor​(T initialState)
      Creates an instance that is initially set to the state of initialState and synchronizes on itself.
      StateMonitor​(T initialState, com.programix.thread.Waiter waiter)
      Creates an instance that is initially set to the state of initialState and synchronizes on the lock used by the specified waiter.
      StateMonitor​(T initialState, java.lang.Object lockObject)
      Creates an instance that is initially set to the state of initialState and synchronizes on the specified lockObject.
